body: This is so incredibly hot, especially since it's in colour. Wish they'd nipple fucked her too. Would make milking easier

I think this might be my favorite Algolagnia set! Blissfully lacking in dickgirls, this work combines the ruthless brutality typical of most of Algolagnia's work with public humiliation and a nice idol flair!  Shizuku's deflowering by microphone might be the crowning achievement of this doujin!
